title: The server in the past couple of days
body:
Anyone else here experienced a strange server lag this week, where the whole game feels like it is DDosed? In one instance, the game was nearly over and then everyone crashed. Some returned to the game but then it crashed again and doesn't show up in history. Happened again yesterday, I get the message "trying to reconnect" near the end of the game. The rest of my internet is fine, no lag, no problems. 

Also in custom games, its taking forever to select a bot champion in the team select.
